import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Button, Card, CardBody, CardGroup, Col, Container, Form, Input, InputGroup, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText, Row } from "reactstrap"; import firebase from 'firebase'; const Login = () => { const [account, setAccount] = useState({}); const handleLogin = () => { const ref = firebase.database(); ref .ref("users") .orderByChild("username") .equalTo(account.username) .on("value", async snapshot => { if (snapshot.val() === null) { confirm.log('login') } else { console.log('err') } }); } return (
